scenes.title: Banned Topics
scenes.subtitle: F-08 — Foundations
scenes.narration: This is the most critical lesson in the entire training. Breaking these rules means instant termination. Pay attention.

scenes.heading: Zero Tolerance — Instant Termination
points: Underage references — any mention of minors
Meet-ups — never agree to meet in person
Illegal substances — drugs of any kind
scenes.narration: These topics will get you fired instantly. And they can get the creator's account permanently banned from OnlyFans. Underage references. Any mention of minors in any context. Zero tolerance. Non-consensual acts. Anything involving force or lack of consent. Meet-ups. Never agree to meet a fan in person, ever. Illegal substances. No drug references, no exceptions. And outside payment methods. Never accept or suggest Venmo, CashApp, crypto, or anything outside OnlyFans. All payments go through the platform.

scenes.heading: Also Banned
points: Extreme fetishes that violate platform rules
Racism or hate speech of any kind
These are OnlyFans rules — not just ours
Breaking them = account ban + you're fired
scenes.narration: Also banned. Extreme fetishes that violate OnlyFans terms of service. And racism or hate speech of any kind. These aren't just our rules. These are OnlyFans platform rules. If you break them, the creator's account gets banned. That means the creator loses their income, the agency loses a client, and you lose your job. Immediately. No second chances.

scenes.title: Quick Check
scenes.subtitle: Next: Handling Banned Requests
scenes.narration: Quick check. A fan asks to meet up in person. What do you do? Pause. You reject it immediately. This is a banned topic. No discussion. Good. Next, let's learn exactly how to handle these situations when they come up.
